channel.title: Node.js on Code Before Breach
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Code Before Breach

item.title: Dicer Module Vulnerability Mitigation Guide: CVE-2022-24434
item.description: This guide analyzes a vulnerability in the Dicer module indirectly affecting Multer, and provides a practical mitigation strategy. It serves as a real-world example of dealing with unmaintained open source dependencies.
